content:
Hello,

I have two terms, x and y, of type Sigma Î² (dependent pair). I also have h : x = y. How can I get HEq x.snd y.snd? (Using Lean 4)

I guess it would involve some "rec*" function, but I don't get it to work. Some help would be highly appreciated.

Thanks,
Tage
Have you tried writing have : HEq x.snd y.snd and trying to prove it?
I would imagine rw h alone is sufficient
It of course works! I was probably far too tired yesturday knight so I used the wrong hypothesis when rewriting. I appologize.
Tage Johansson has marked this topic as resolved.
